summary: Getting tired of the colourfull and shiny look of Skyrim? You want to have the real MEDIEVIL ATMOSPHERE? Go get it here and deep into a darker, more realistic and brutal world of Skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img813.imageshack.us/img813/7923/skylifehead.png[/img]	

[u][b]SkyLife_ENB-FXAA_HDR_Hybrid_Real-Medievil_Lightning_and_Shadow[/b][/u]

[color=red]~ Darker and more gritty atmosphere
~ New lightning effects
~ Sharper textures with new FXAA Post Process Injector
~ Enhanced contrast [/color]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[img]http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/7609/installc.png[/img]

1.) Extract
2.) Copy the content from \"Skyrim\"-folder into your Skyrim folder on harddrive ([..]steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\)
3.) Copy the content from \"Ini\"-folder in here: C:\\Users\\XXX\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim
    !!!Backup YOUR Ini\'s before that!!!
4.) Enjoy!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Works best with HD-Texture mods and effect mods from here!

[u][b]Credits to:[/u][/b]
TESV Acceleration Layer
ENBSerie v0.102 by Boris Vorontsov 
FFXA injector by some_dude
RShd by diiamondx
BETHESDA
[/center]
author: Crussong
